eecs.jago.element
Interface SensorState

All Known Implementing Classes:
RobotGuiBase, StandardSensor
public interface SensorState

The SensorState interface maintains the standard states of robot sensors.

Since:
5.1

Field Summary
static int NOT_READY
          Indicates that this sensor has not been properly initialized yet.
static int OFF
          Indicates that the sensor is not active (not necessarily turned off)
static int ON
          Indicates that the sensor is ON.
 

Field Detail

NOT_READY

public static final int NOT_READY
Indicates that this sensor has not been properly initialized yet. Usually relates to active sensors (such as light sensors), but may also apply to other sensors that require extra time to initialize.

Since:
6.1
See Also:
Constant Field Values

OFF

public static final int OFF
Indicates that the sensor is not active (not necessarily turned off)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ON

public static final int ON
Indicates that the sensor is ON. Normally used for TOUCH sensors

See Also:
Constant Field Values
